availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James Scaff (Graves County, KY, farmer and prov govt)

body.p: Graves County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Married o Sarah Comfort Scaff in Logan County, Kentucky on September 20, 1826 . Father of S. Scaff, James D. Scaff, J. Scaff, and M. S. Scaff. Farmer in Graves County in 1840. Farmer in Graves County in 1850. Member of the convention of the provisional government held at Russellville in November 1861.

ab.bibl:
Sixth Manuscript Census of the United States (1840), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Graves County, p. 108, p. 21-22 on microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Graves County, District 1, p. 432A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, X County Marriages, Film # 002134965, p. 836 of microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
KYR-0004-033-0001.
